Description: Fragment of upper parts of pottery transport amphora. Slight everted lip; slight bulge at top of tall neck.
Curator's comments: Not located, published by Petrie in 1886 (Petrie 1886, pl.XVII). Either Mendean or from another North Greek source.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JA.055)
